channel.title: update issue - fasttrack: 500 SSL error: wrong version number / unexpected TLS packet
channel.description:
issue:
> Err:4 http://HTTPS///fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease > 500 SSL error: wrong version number [IP: 127.0.0.1 3142]
workaround here:
[https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates#fasttrack_500_SSL_error:_wrong_version_number](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates#fasttrack_500_SSL_error:_wrong_version_number)
(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)
